title: Resources
text:
Helpful readings

The Fundamental Theorem of Linear Algebra by Gilbert Strang



Helpful courses and videos

Matrix Methods In Data Analysis, Signal Processing, And Machine Learning at MIT
Mathematical Foundations of Machine Learning at UChicago
Data Driven Science and Engineering at UW
Steve Brunton’s SVD videos
3blue1brown’s Essence of Linear Algebra videos
Data Visualization with R at Georgia State University



High-dimensional datasets


Examples of data analyses/visualizations

Advanced data visualizations by Tanya Shapiro: Going above and beyond the basic capabilities of R visualizations
Data visualization with NFL data by Bradley J Congelio: Great example of using R to generate advanced data visualizations about the NFL.
Exploring college major and income: a live data analysis in R by David Robinson: Video example of a data analysis, in real time.

CDC
Data.gov
